description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Naval Distillate Fuel for CFB Esquimalt.
full_summary:
# W0103-249543_A Naval Distillate Fuel with Synthesized Paraffinic Diesel for CFB Esquimalt

### Tender Information

* Tender Reference: WS4171312962-Doc4171345360
* Solicitation Number: WS4171312962
* Amendment Number: 4

### Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: 11 October 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* Further information regarding the tender can be found on Ariba Discovery link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17324318?extsite=MTczMjQzMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply and delivery of up to 8 million litres of finished, blended naval distillate fuel containing 40% by volume of synthesized paraffinic diesel by barge to CFB Esquimalt. This requirement includes a firm 4 million litres of fuel, with an option for an additional 4 million litres.

### Delivery and Deadline

* The fuel is required to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt by 31 December 2024.
* Bids should be submitted on October 11, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Specifications and Requirements

* The fuel must meet strict specifications, which are outlined in the tender documents.
* The vendor must provide documentation to confirm compliance with these specifications.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is covered by the following trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.

### Contact

For further information, please contact:
* MacLeod, Bobbi (SPAC/PSPC)
* bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage,  Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Canada

### Notice

This tender is subject to change, so
